name: Kosuke Saito
description: '''{{nihongo|Kosuke Saito|斉藤広祐|''Saitō Kōsuke''}}''' (born December 17, 1983), also known as '''kors k''', is a Japanese DJ and music game composer. He is best known for his work in the [[Bemani]] series made by [[Konami]]. He has produced music under a number of different aliases, such as kors k, Eagle, StripE, and teranoid.
